InstalledItem.Name: Eos
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: RSIÂ 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The Eos quantum drive has been a staple in the RSI product line for centuries. Its original design was so perfectly fine-tuned that it has remained basically unchanged since.

InstalledItem.Name: OverDrive
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Amon & Reese Co.
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Amon & Reese knows from years of experience just how hard the military can push their ships. Their OverDrive power plant was designed from the ground up to not only handle those tough conditions with less overheating, but to provide the same dependability and power to civilians as well.

Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 3
Missiles: 2xS2

Behringâs MSD-322 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 3 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of two S2 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Rattler II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Nova Pyrotechnica
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 2

The Rattler is a cost-effective cluster missile that will no doubt appeal to a wide variety of pilots. When fired, the Rattler will track the opponentâs IR signature and create an opening barrage that weakens the armor or shields, leaving the target vulnerable to the full payload that follows.

Built to the high demands of daily military service, Aegisâ Polar cooler features a reinforced frame for increased durability. You can rest assured that when you drop into the fires of combat, the Polar will keep your ship cool.

When energy autocannons are designed, Behring's M5A provides the standard to which they are measured against, owing to its long range of engagement and low damage fallout.
